org.mechio.api.motion.messaging

Class RemoteRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeNotifier
      • org.mechio.api.motion.AbstractRobot<RemoteJoint>
        • org.mechio.api.motion.messaging.RemoteRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeSource, Robot<RemoteJoint>

    public class RemoteRobot
extends AbstractRobot<RemoteJoint>
    RemoteRobot is a facade for controlling a remotely connected Robot. The RemoteRobot controls the Robot using a RemoteRobotClient.
    Author:
    Matthew Stevenson

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.mechio.api.motion.Robot

        public void setEnabled(boolean val)
        Description copied from class: AbstractRobot
